name: Galactic Retribution
description:
The aliens have destroyed your planet! It's time you enact your revenge on their planet! Control an army of troopers and strategically place buildings to conquer the aliens.

-=CONTROLS=-
WASD - Move camera around the map
Hold left click and drag the cursor over units to select them
Right click to command your units to move
Space bar to deselect all units
Scroll with the mouse wheel to zoom in and out
I to hide the main HUD
